title: Angular Guard Schema
description: Creates a new, generic Angular guard definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the guard file, relative to the selected project (/src/(lib|app)/<relative_path>) or relative to workspace (<root_workspace>/<relative_path>).

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the guard?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new guard.

implements.description: Specifies which route guards to implement (hold Ctrl to multiselect).
